title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.193 - Valve installation in plastic pipe
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.193 - Valve installation in plastic pipe

State Regulations

Each valve installed in plastic pipe must be designed so
as to protect the plastic material against excessive torsional or shearing
loads when the valve or shut-off is operated, and from any other secondary
stresses that might be exerted through the valve or its
enclosure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.193

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
